subject: Re: [junit] Htmlunit
msgSnippet: ... The tutorials at htmlunit.sourceforge.net are quite straightforward. They ll help you write test code. To use HtmlUnit in Eclipse, simply add the *.jar
messageBody:
florin198028 wrote:
>
>
> I use eclipse and devellope a web application, and i want to test it.
> i hope you can help me.
> How to get started with my test? how to install Htmlunit in eclipse?
> and how to run a Htmlunit test in eclipse
> I wait an answer from you

The tutorials at htmlunit.sourceforge.net are quite straightforward.
They'll help you write test code.

To use HtmlUnit in Eclipse, simply add the *.jar files to your project's
build path.

Good luck.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
